verses.text: O God, \w you|strong="H1961"\w* \w are|strong="H3063"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* God; early \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H1961"\w* make \w my|strong="H1961"\w* search \w for|strong="H1732"\w* \w you|strong="H1961"\w*: \w my|strong="H1961"\w* soul \w is|strong="H1961"\w* dry \w for|strong="H1732"\w* need \w of|strong="H1732"\w* \w you|strong="H1961"\w*, \w my|strong="H1961"\w* flesh \w is|strong="H1961"\w* wasted \w with|strong="H1732"\w* desire \w for|strong="H1732"\w* \w you|strong="H1961"\w*, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* dry \w and|strong="H3063"\w* burning land where no water \w is|strong="H1961"\w*;

\w To|strong="H0430"\w* see \w your|strong="H0859"\w* \w power|strong="H0410"\w* \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H0859"\w* glory, \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* seen \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* holy \w place|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w Because|strong="H3651"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* mercy \w is|strong="H3651"\w* better than life, \w my|strong="H7200"\w* lips \w will|strong="H5797"\w* \w give|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H7200"\w* praise.

\w So|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H8193"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* go on blessing \w you|strong="H3588"\w* all \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w*, lifting up \w my|strong="H3588"\w* hands \w in|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* name.

\w My|strong="H5375"\w* soul \w will|strong="H8034"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* comforted, \w as|strong="H3651"\w* \w with|strong="H3651"\w* good food; \w and|strong="H3709"\w* \w my|strong="H5375"\w* mouth \w will|strong="H8034"\w* \w give|strong="H5375"\w* \w you|strong="H1288"\w* \w praise|strong="H1288"\w* \w with|strong="H3651"\w* songs \w of|strong="H8034"\w* joy;

\w When|strong="H3644"\w* \w the|strong="H1984"\w* memory \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w you|strong="H3644"\w* comes \w to|strong="H5315"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w on|strong="H6310"\w* \w my|strong="H5315"\w* bed, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w when|strong="H3644"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* give thought \w to|strong="H5315"\w* \w you|strong="H3644"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H1984"\w* night-time.

\w Because|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H0518"\w* \w have|strong="H0518"\w* \w been|strong="H2142"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* help, \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H0518"\w* \w have|strong="H0518"\w* \w joy|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* shade \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* wings.
\w My|strong="H1961"\w* soul keeps ever near \w you|strong="H3588"\w*: \w your|strong="H3588"\w* right hand \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w support|strong="H5833"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3225"\w* \w those|strong="H0310"\w* whose \w desire|strong="H5315"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H0310"\w* soul's destruction \w will|strong="H5315"\w* go down \w to|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H0310"\w* lower parts \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H0310"\w* earth.

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H0776"\w* cut off \w by|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* sword; \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H0776"\w* food \w for|strong="H0776"\w* foxes.

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w joy|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w*; everyone who takes \w an|strong="H1961"\w* oath \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w cause|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* pride; \w but|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* false mouth \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* stopped.
